LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CategoriesWithoutFilters.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter the ids, split by comma, of all the categories in which you don't want filters to be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ClickToConfigure
LocaleResource.Value: To configure the plugin either click HERE or go to Plugins -> Nop Ajax Filters -> Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseAttributesFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close Attributes Filter Boxes By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseAttributesFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the attributes filter boxes to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.NumberOfAttributeFilters.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the maximum number of product attributes to be shown on catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseManufacturersFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close Manufacturers Filter Boxes By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseManufacturersFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the manufacturers filter boxes to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseOnSaleFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close OnSale Filter Boxes By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseOnSaleFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the OnSale filter boxes to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ClosePriceRangeFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close Price Range Filter Box By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ClosePriceRangeFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the price range filter box to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseSpecificationsFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close Specifications Filter Boxes By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseSpecificationsFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the specifications filter boxes to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.NumberOfSpecificationFilters.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the maximum number of specification attributes to be shown on catalog pages.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseVendorsFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close Vendors Filter Boxes By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseVendorsFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the vendors filter boxes to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ElementToScrollAfterFiltrationSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To This Element After Filtration

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ElementToScrollAfterFiltrationSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Here you can list your element selectors, divided by commas. We scroll to the first found element. Default behaviour is scroll to .product-selectors.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableAttributesFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on product attributes.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableManufacturersFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on product manufacturers.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableOnSaleFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on product with different old and new prices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnablePriceRangeFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on product price.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableSpecificationsFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on product specifications.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableVendorsFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on product vendors.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableInStockFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable filtering based on products which are in stock.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseInStockFilterBox
LocaleResource.Value: Close In Stock Filter Boxes By Default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseInStockFilterBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the InStock filter boxes to be closed by default.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.FiltersUIMode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The user interface mode of the Ajax Filters (checkboxes or dropdowns).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.PagerPanelSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the panel that contains the paging.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.PagerPanelIntegrationSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the element after which the panel that contains the paging will be shown. This setting is applied only in the cases when initially there is no pager and afterwards it is necessary to be added.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ProductPageSizeDropDownSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the panel that contains the product page size dropdown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ProductsGridPanelSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the panel that contains the product grid.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ProductsListPanelSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the panel that contains the product list.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.EnableInfiniteScroll.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enabling the infinite scroll will remove the pager and load more products on scroll.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltration
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To Element On The Page After Filtration (Desktop)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltration.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the page will be scrolled to the element specified below only on dektop devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltrationMobile
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To Element On The Page After Filtration (Mobile)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltrationMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the page will be scrolled to the element specified below only on mobile devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseFiltersPanelAfterFiltrationInMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the filters panel will be closed on mobile devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnCategoryPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Category Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnCategoryPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Category Page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnManufacturerPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Manufacturer Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnManufacturerPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Manufacturer Page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnVendorPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Vendor Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnVendorPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Vendor Page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnSearchPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Search Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowFiltersOnSearchPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show Ajax Filters on Search Page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowSelectedFiltersPanel.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Shows a panel with all chosen filters (clicking the filter name removes the filter).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowNumberOfReturnedProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This setting enables showing information for the products that are visible out of all available, matching the filter criteria in format e.g. "5 showing from 20".

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowNumberOfReturnedProductsSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the element after which the panel with number of returned products will be shown. If the element is not present the panel will be shown inside .product-selectors element.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.SortOptionsDropDownSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the panel that contains the sorted options for the dropdown list.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.SystemSettingsInfo
LocaleResource.Value: System Settings (please do not edit unless you have css style names for the product or pager panels different from the default):

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.Theme.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The theme for the filters. The theme name correponds to the name of a folder inside the Themes folder.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ViewOptionsDropDownSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the panel that contains the view options for the dropdown (grid or list).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.WidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The names of the widget zone in which the Ajax Filters can be added. NOTE: The Ajax Filters can be added only to one widget zone.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.SearchInProductTags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set to search in product tags.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.SpecificationAttributeSliders.Info
LocaleResource.Value: In this tab, you can select which specifications would appear as a slider! Please note that the specification option values must be either whole numbers (integers) or decimals.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Client.Common.NoResultsFoundMessage
LocaleResource.Value: There are no products for the filters that you selected. Please widen your search criteria.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.TrailingZeroesSeparator.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This setting is used to remove trailing zeroes from min/max price in price range filter. For example if you have min or max price like 12.350,00 and you like to get rid of the last two zeroes you can specify ',' as value of the setting. If you want to specify several separators keep in mind that you need to list them without separating them - for example if you need dot and a comma as your separators write them like this '.,'.
